group_1.textLeft: They’re going to have a Tanabata Festival in @Mizuna, right? Wanna check it out?

group_1.textRight: Let’s do it! Festivals are the best!
Master!

group_1.textLeft: ...Oh, Tsuruno. Didn’t you have school today?

group_1.textRight: Nope! Let's head over to Mikazuki Villa together!

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, but I have to go to work now.
My manager will be coming to pick me up soon…

group_1.textRight: Aw, man...
Which magazine are you shooting for this time?

group_1.textLeft: We're not shooting for a magazine today... @We're meeting for a drama.

group_1.textRight: [chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...Oh my god!? A drama!?

group_1.textLeft: There’s a Tanabata Festival in Mizuna, right? @It’s a part of that event...
They’re making a children’s drama based on @Mizuna folklore.
I’ll be helping out on set.

group_1.textRight: ...Are you going to be in it? Will it air on @national TV...?

group_1.textLeft: No, it won’t be broadcasted on television.
We’ll perform live on the festival day and @recordings will be put on the web.

group_1.textRight: But why you, Master? @You’re not from the Mizuna Ward...

group_1.textLeft: They were just looking to cast actors from @Kamihama in general...
So I was asked to lend them a hand.

group_1.textRight: I see… Everyone loves local celebrities!
Then Sayu-Sayu, Mizuna’s hometown idol, @will also be...

group_1.textLeft: Of course she will. She’s been cast in @one of the leading roles.
The filming will be handled by her agency as well.
I heard that all production is taking place locally...

group_1.textRight: ...I guess that makes sense.
If it's for the community, the community @should make it together.
Still... are you sure everything will be okay?

group_1.textLeft: Well… Now that the incident with the Wings of @Magius has been settled...

group_1.textRight: No, I’m not talking about that… Remember the @time when we helped Karin?

group_1.textLeft: Now. Prepare yourself. How will you survive @this, Knight?

group_1.textRight: Pfffthaha!!
Yachiyo, come on, take this seriously. @Kidding around at a time like this!

group_1.textLeft: ...I wasn’t kidding around. I’m being @completely serious.

group_1.textRight: You’re reading your lines like a robot.

group_1.textLeft: ...We managed to handle that performace.
Don’t worry… Everything will turn out just fine... Probably.

group_1.textRight: But you seem more nervous than ever...
Hey, can I come with you?

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: I thought I could come watch!

group_1.textLeft: That’s fine with me.

group_1.textRight: Yay!

group_1.textLeft: Looks like the manager's here to pick us up.
Shall we be off?
